1116703555325431809.text: js-libp2p 0.25 is on the webs! We've added auto dialing to discovered peers and have made a ton of improvements to connection management. You can read the highlights at https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p/issues/342 …. #libp2p #JS.

1101145543189975042.text: Discover an InterPlanetary Web at the first IPFS Camp in Barcelona on June 27-30. Join us for three action-packed days of workshops, hacking and deep dives. Learn more and apply to attend at https://camp.ipfs.io/register  #IPFS #libp2p #DWeb

1089943815497101312.text: The summary from Golang #IPFS, #libp2p and #IPLD Hack Week in London is up at --https://blog.ipfs.io/65-london-hack-week-report …  It includes  video report backs on Bitswap, Provider Strategies, an intro to a much waited GraphSync Spec, IPLD Selectors and more! Go check it out while it is still hawt

1072153431408816130.text:
We're also cranking up the search for these (unlisted) roles in the @libp2p team:

* Program Manager, libp2p
* Technical Writer, libp2p
* Community Manager, libp2p
* JS Systems Engineer, libp2p

Hit me up via DM if any of those thrills you! 
#js #remotework #dev @MPtherealMVP

1063430636189437954.text: js-libp2p v0.24.0 is here #libp2p #JS! We’ve added support for custom routers, turned relay on by default and threw in some extra goodies and improvements. Highlights are here:https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p/issues/249 …

1058712044277510144.text:
Excited to see the buzz and vibrant community around @libp2p at #devcon4. Once started by @protocollabs, this modular, open P2P networking stack has become an asset and public good for decentralised infrastructure.

Ethereum, let’s #buidl the future of P2P networks together pic.twitter.com/PCaMbJZK3s

1051221069632335872.text: Friends of London  me and a bunch of @ipfsbot folks will be hosting a meetup for the IPFS Community next Thursday -- https://www.meetup.com/london-ipfs/events/255386386/ … -- come hang out! #IPFS

1030059189534633985.text: #libdweb enables experimental p2p APIs for web extensions in #Firefox.  This video demonstrates how #JS #IPFS can take advantage of them to  discover and talk to other IPFS nodes on the local network! https://youtu.be/LDHFqwC8Syg  #MDNS #TCP

1048239293389578241.text: @ChrisPacia did an excellent talk on the design of @libp2p https://www.infoq.com/presentations/blockchain-libp2p … 100% recommend checking it out. Thank you for creating this resource!

1027296652594499584.text: #libdweb #MDNS discovery for #JS #IPFS running in a web extension https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FRzyWUXIyeo … @IPFSbot @mozhacks @gozala @soapdogpic.twitter.com/zoCoDovnO3

1020224902966759425.text: #polkadot is the baptism of fire for the #rustlang implementation of #libp2p, and I've just spent the past two days fixing bugs. Things are still a bit broken, but it's slowly starting to be reliable.https://twitter.com/polkadotnetwork/status/1019553711646003200 …

1022824309537026048.text:
js-libp2p just got its first _official_ release #libp2p #JS v0.23.0 
 Test 
 Build dist version 
 Update Contributors list 
 v0.22.0 -> v0.23.0 
 Gen Changelog 
 Publish to npm 

This is a info release, check all the highlights here:https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p/issues/226 …

1018461419845636096.text: Just merged our @protocollabs @libp2p integration into @paritytech @polkadotnetwork master branch ready for PoC-2. Polkadot is now libp2p powered.

1012701416857657347.text: To quote Jaco: #Polkadot JS is syncing from @polkadotnetwork Rust over @libp2p for the first time today.pic.twitter.com/us5lQSVKRG

1001432008302694400.text:
I love the smell of a new release in the morning 
#IPFS #JS v0.29.0 
 Test 
 Build dist version 
 Update Contributors list 
 Bump Version: v0.28.2 -> v0.29.0 
 Gen Changelog 
 Publish to npm 

Find the latest on your favorite module store!

989428513232089094.text: I get a lot of questions of how the IPFS is capable to provide a content addressing. Fun fact is that IPFS core is small, most of the heavy lifting happens on its networking stack, @libp2p. Today, I want to share an overview with y’all on why it exists and why it is so important.pic.twitter.com/8hpJ2Q4O59

977182907877019654.text: Why @LibP2P? Jack and Pierre are now leading the #LibP2P workshop at the #ZeroKnowledge Summit in Berlin. #ZK0x01 #ZKSummitpic.twitter.com/lWzU2ZLsQK

958778588085436416.text: It's that time of the year again, @fosdem is happening in 3 days  and this time I'm coming with a bunch of @IPFSbot people. Howler if you will be there and/or want to chat about the Distributed Web #DWEB

957828511108161537.text: yep -- we've been chipping away at a #rustlang implementation of libp2p for the past several months. Kademlia routing implementation is now underway. Hopefully we can see integration into @ParityTech node soon.
